trans-unit.source: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种方法，以创建和格式化用于描述 XML Web services 的有效的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档文件，该文件是完整的，具有适当的命名空间、元素和特性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A> method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实例可以创建使用`new`关键字或静态<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A>方法，它分析 WSDL 文件，并将其值赋给类的合适成员。

trans-unit.source: WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: WSDL，则基于 XML 的语言，用于描述 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>类对应于根元素，`definitions`的 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明包含的绑定元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `binding` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>返回此属性对应的列表`binding`括通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素`definitions`根元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> represents a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file that can be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 是否表示可分析的有效 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> can recognize the node on which the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is positioned; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 可以识别 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 所在的节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensibility elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 中的扩展性元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of extensibility elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 中的扩展性元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Import" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Import" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of import elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明包含的导入元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `import` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection>返回此属性对应的列表`import`括通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素`definitions`根元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Message" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Message" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of message elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明包含的消息元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `message` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection>返回此属性对应的列表`message`括通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素`definitions`根元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace in which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class is defined ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/").
trans-unit.target: 在其中定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 类的 XML 命名空间（“http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/”）。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 元素集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `portType` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection>返回此属性对应的列表`portType`括通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素`definitions`根元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，它包含要读取的字节。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 实例加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> instance, passed by reference, which contains the text to be read.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 实例，它包含要读取的文本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file to be read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object by directly loading the XML from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从指定的文件加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />, passed by reference, which contains the XML data to be read.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />，它包含要读取的 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，它包含要读取的字节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否根据 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 指定的架构验证 XML 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 实例加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file to be read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否根据 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 指定的架构验证 XML 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object by directly loading the XML from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从指定的文件加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />, passed by reference, which contains the XML data to be read.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />，它包含要读取的 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否根据 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 指定的架构验证 XML 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否根据 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 指定的架构验证 XML 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过直接从 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 加载 XML 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the XML Web service to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> instance applies.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 实例应用于的 XML Web services 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web services 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 关联的架构。

trans-unit.source: The schema associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 关联的构架。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 对象和 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档之间进行序列化和反序列化的 XML 序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 用于在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 对象和 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档之间进行序列化和反序列化的 XML 序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用派生自抽象类自定义 XML 序列化程序<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>类。

trans-unit.source: These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element.
trans-unit.target: 这些类指定在配置文件中使用`serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes`元素及其子`add`元素。

trans-unit.source: The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
trans-unit.target: 配置可以应用于发布的 Web 服务的 ASP.NET Web 应用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> instance of which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> 为其成员的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: A collection of service description.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> has not been assigned to a parent collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 尚未被分配到父级集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Service" /> instances contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Service" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 实例的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of service instances contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明包含的服务实例的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `service` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection>返回此属性对应的列表`service`括通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素`definitions`根元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML <see langword="targetNamespace" /> attribute of the <see langword="descriptions" /> tag enclosing a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件括起来的 <see langword="targetNamespace" /> 标记的 XML <see langword="descriptions" /> 特性。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service described by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 所描述的 XML Web services 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> contained by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> 所包含的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> instance that represents the data types of both the parameters and return values of the methods exposed by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> 实例，表示由 XML Web services 公开的方法的参数和返回值的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> instance returned by this property corresponds to the list of `types` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types>此属性返回的实例所对应的列表`types`括通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素`definitions`根元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" />, or <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> with the <paramref name="validate" /> parameter set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />，其中包含在调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />、<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />、<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> 并将 <paramref name="validate" /> 参数设置为 <see langword="true" /> 的情况下生成的所有验证警告。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" />, or <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> with the <paramref name="validate" /> parameter set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />，其中包含在调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />、<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />、<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> 并将 <paramref name="validate" /> 参数设置为 <see langword="true" /> 的情况下生成的所有验证警告。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 写出为 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passed by reference, which contains the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file produced.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，其中包含产生的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 写出到指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> that contains the WSDL file produced.
trans-unit.target: 包含产生的 WSDL 文件的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 作为 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件写出到 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The path to which the WSDL file is written.
trans-unit.target: 将 WSDL 文件写入到其中的路径。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 作为 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件写出到指定的路径。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />, passed by reference, which contains the WSDL file produced.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />，其中包含产生的 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 作为 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件写出到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。
